title: Beetroot, feta, wild rocket and chickpea salad
ingredients: ['800g cooked golden and/or red beetroot', '50g wild rocket', '1 red onion, sliced', '400g (can) chickpeas, drained', '200g feta cheese', '1 large lime, juiced', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon fresh thyme', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1/2 teaspoon sweetener']
